Literature.Title: Effect of Self-Assembly on Antimicrobial Activity of Double-Chain Short Cationic Lipopeptides.
Literature.Author: Stachurski O, Neubauer D, Maluch I, Wyrzykowski D, Bauer M, Bartoszewska S, Kamysz W, Sikorska E

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human keratinocytes HaCat:IC50=43.28±6.48 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=128 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis PCM 2118(MIC=8µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=256µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=128µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=8µg/ml)
